text: I think I discovered a bug, when I want to use a subclass of the class Logger. I use the DomConfigurator to configure Log4j and want to use a subclass of Logger. It works fine when I specify the class in each category like If I dont specify the class in each category I get a ClassCastException when I want to get a named Logger-Instance.
